channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meet the researchers testing the “Armageddon” approach to asteroid defense
item.description: One day, in the near or far future, an asteroid about the length of a football stadium will find itself on a collision course with Earth. If we are lu...

item.title: Here’s how much of his fortune Bill Gates will leave to his kids—but who gets the $130 million Washington estate?
item.description: At the heart of his property portfolio is Xanadu 2.0, an expansive compound named for the fictional estate in the movie ‘Citizen Kane.’

item.title: Even after the selloff, U.S. stocks are still too pricey, says Citigroup, cutting them to neutral
item.description: Citigroup downgrades U.S. stocks to neutral, saying valuations are still too rich.

item.title: My late uncle’s house is in foreclosure. A woman claims to be his daughter and my cousin is a squatter. What can we do?
item.description: “She keeps threatening to remove this nephew from the home.”

item.title: Investors are jittery about earnings — and that’s opening up big opportunities, say Goldman strategists
item.description: Looking at the demand for put over call options, fear remains at extreme levels despite the 90-day delay in most tariffs, say strategists led by John ...

item.title: ‘The whole thing feels predatory’: My grandma, 97, pays $170 a month for a $10,000 life-insurance policy. Should we stop payments?
item.description: “After what quickly became a heated discussion, the agent advised me that canceling the policy would end any chance of a payout.”

item.title: Beyond ARC-AGI: GAIA and the search for a real intelligence benchmark
item.description: GUEST: Intelligence is pervasive, yet its measurement seems subjective. At best, we approximate its measure through tests and benchmarks. Think of col...

item.title: Boumarang buys Wavedrone to add maritime systems to drone portfolio
item.description: Boumarang, which has developed hydrogen-powered aerial drones, received investment in addition to acquiring Wavedrone. The post Boumarang buys Wavedro...

item.title: Trump backs off on electronics tariffs (updated)
item.description: Reacting to continuing stock market woes and perhaps tech industry lobbyin, Trump backed off on tariffs for electronics late last night.

item.title: ForwardX new self-production facility to produce 5,000 mobile robots per year
item.description: With a high annual production capacity, ForwardX said the factory is well-positioned to meet the increasing demand for robotics systems. The post Forw...

item.title: Bigger isn’t always better: Examining the business case for multi-million token LLMs
item.description: Are we unlocking new frontiers in AI reasoning, or simply stretching the limits of token memory without meaningful improvements?

item.title: GamesBeat Summit 2025 speakers will help us navigate back to growth | The DeanBeat
item.description: Get ready. GamesBeat Summit 2025 will take place on May 19 to May 20 at the Marriott Marina del Rey in Los Angeles.

item.title: Now it’s TikTok parent ByteDance’s turn for a reasoning AI: enter Seed-Thinking-v1.5!
item.description: It achieved an 8.0% higher win rate over DeepSeek R1, suggesting that its strengths generalize beyond just logic or math-heavy challenges.
